title: League of Legends quit unexpectedly (MAC)/ found a temporary solution?
body:
Can't open my client, well I can reinstall the game but probably next time when I got back my internet quota. 

However, I found a workaround by  some random luck. By right clicking on the LoL client on the dock. Go into options and open at login. You see a LeagueClient, open it.

Just sharing this to anyone who might face the same issues in the future on MACS

P.S : Don't buy macs in the future after your current one spoils.

replies.body: If you quit the app like if you wanted to play another game so you closed it and later wanted to play it again you can click the apple sign at the top left and go to recent items and login to league from their to reopen it. Bit late but incase any one else still has this issue <3
